Title: Prehistoric Blue
Plot: Shovel and Pail find dinosaur footprints in the backyard, leading Shovel to worry that dinosaurs might be lurking in the backyard, despite Pail's assurances that they became extinct millions of years ago. We help to calm Shovel's fears by identifying the real animals that are in the backyard. We have fun with Steve pretending to be dinosaurs, learning, among other things, the difference between meat-eaters and plant-eaters. GuestStars: Danielle Conwall, David Duoras, Emma Handlin, Sierra Leitner, Katie McWane, Michael Rylerband, Cameron Twitty
